mapper.select: select *,@rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum from diary d join diary_folder f join (select @rownum:=0) r on d.diary_folder_num=f.diary_folder_num where f.diary_folder_num=#{value} order by rownum desc
select diary_com_num,content,regdate,id from diary_com where diary_num=#{value} order by diary_com_num desc
select name from member where id=#{value}
select id from hompy where hompy_num=#{value}

select d.diary_num,d.title,d.content, d.regdate,d.love,f.fname,f.diary_folder_num,@rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum from diary d join (select @rownum:=0) r join diary_folder f on d.diary_folder_num=f.diary_folder_num where type='전체공개' and f.hompy_num=#{value} order by diary_num desc

select d.diary_num,d.title,d.content, d.regdate,d.love,f.fname,f.diary_folder_num,@rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum from diary d join (select @rownum:=0) r join diary_folder f on d.diary_folder_num=f.diary_folder_num where f.hompy_num=#{value} order by diary_num desc
select diary_com_num from diary_com where diary_num=#{value}
select hompy_num from hompy where id=#{value}
select diary_folder_num,fname from diary_folder where hompy_num=#{hompy_num}
select date_format(regdate,'%d') from diary where date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m')=#{value}
mapper.update: update diary set diary_folder_num=#{diary_folder_num} where diary_num=#{diary_num}
mapper.select: select fname from diary_folder where diary_folder_num=#{value}
mapper.update: update diary_folder set fname=#{fname} where diary_folder_num=#{diary_folder_num}
mapper.select: select diary_num from diary where diary_folder_num=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from diary_folder where diary_folder_num=#{diary_folder_num} and hompy_num=#{hompy_num};
mapper.select: select diary_num,date_format(d.regdate,'%Y') y,date_format(d.regdate,'%m') m,date_format(d.regdate,'%d') d from diary d join diary_folder f on d.diary_folder_num=f.diary_folder_num where hompy_num=#{value}
mapper.update: update diary_com set content=#{content},regdate=now() where diary_com_num=#{diary_com_num}
mapper.select: select hompy_num from hompy where id=#{id} and hompy_num=#{hompy_num}
